def_cn: 辣根（一种植物的肉质根，常制成调味汁）
def_en: Horseradish is a small white vegetable that is the root of a crop. It has a very strong sharp taste and is often made into a sauce.

def_cn: 辣根汁（常作烤牛肉的调味汁）
def_en: Horseradish or horseradish sauce is a sauce made from horseradish. It is often eaten with roast beef.
